short_description: fastpath function used to encode categorical features as a one-hot numeric vectors using the information from the TD_OneHotEncodingFit function
long_description: fastpath function used to encode categorical features as a one-hot numeric vectors using the information from the TD_OneHotEncodingFit function

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

input_tables.name: FitTable
input_tables.rDescription: The FitTable input contains encoding parameters generated by TD_OneHotEncodingFit.
input_tables.description: The FitTable input contains encoding parameters generated by TD_OneHotEncodingFit.

argument_clauses.name: IsInputDense
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether input is in dense format or sparse format.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether input is in dense format or sparse format.
